featured.text: Government policies were made and public organizations established to prevent the spread of alcoholism in the country.

definition.zh_def: 酗酒症，指對酒精的依賴和無法控制的飲酒行為。
definition.en_def: A chronic disease characterized by an inability to control or stop drinking alcohol despite negative consequences.
definition.example: His alcoholism affected his relationships and job performance.
